title: The Retiring Allowances (Parish Councillors) Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-retiring-allowances-parish-councillors-act | Legal areas: Local Government

provisions.title: Section 9
provisions.content:
9. Cessation of retiring allowance if person in receipt thereof again
    becomes a councillor.

provisions.title: Section 15
provisions.content:
15. Power to make regulations.
